pathAssistantSteps.info:
1. To complete this stage of the process you must mark the status as completed in the MILESTONES box below.
  2. Finally proceed to mark the stage as completed.
  3. Remember to assign the quality engineer responsible for this case, otherwise you won't be able to complete this stage.
